review: Love my Chromecast! Made my large HD TV very smart... Control from my iPhone or iPad and even laptop.
author: Si Guy

review: Works as expected. Easy to set up and use. No issues with it.
author: Michael Stryker

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. I stream Youtube movies and videos from my table and phone. Also, you can steam Netflix, Hulu, Showbox, and whatever movie you have on your phone or tablet.
author: sultana

review: Really nice packaging, easy setup, and surprisingly responsive. A simple but effective product that I will be using often. Works with all of my favorite content. Really happy with this purchase.
author: Spencer Sherman

review: Sometimes the receptins isn't as clear, but over all it's fun and easy to use
